QuestData.Title: Gold Dust Exchange
QuestData.Description: The kobolds in these parts sometimes carry Gold Dust on them. I could really use the stuff - bring me a load of it and I'll give you the best price in town...best price in town!$B$BYou can find kobolds in the Fargodeep Mine to the south, and around the Jasperlode Mine to the northeast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 10 Gold Dust to Remy "Two Times" in Goldshire. Gold Dust is gathered from Kobolds in Elwynn Forest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Psst! You have that Gold Dust for me...for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for the dust, $n. Here's your cash, and...here is a token from associates of mine. You might find it useful...useful.
